raw_body: FERNANDOPULLE Dr JBT (Homeopathic Doctor and Retd. Senior Asst. Director,​ Central Bank of Sri Lanka). Beloved husband of Scholastica,​ loving father of Dushan (USA),​ Niroshan,​ Shamila (Airport and Aviation,​ Katunayake) and Shivanthi (ex Seylan Bank),​ father-in-law of Poornima (USA) and Dhanuka (Director,​ Lanka Florists),​ loving grandfather of Thinuk. Cortege leaves residence at 3.30 p.m. on Wednesday the 4th of October for Burial at RC Cemetery,​ Welihena. 234/​1,​ Welihena,​ Kochchikade.062224
